injuries.content: 20220801 Minnesota Twins: 1B Nick Castellanos was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: bruised thigh. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 4 days. 20220801 Oakland Athletics: RF Zach Cone was injured on a defensive play. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220802 Minnesota Twins: RF Jorge Soler was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: bruised hand. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last one week. 20220802 Texas Rangers: RF J.D. Martinez was injured while running the bases. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220802 Colorado Rockies: 2B Spencer Taylor was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: knee tendinitis. He's expected to miss about one week. 20220802 Colorado Rockies: SS Joel Davis was injured being hit by a pitch. The Diagnosis: bruised knee. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 1-2 weeks. 20220802 Seattle Mariners: 2B Cash Case was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: quadriceps strain. He's expected to miss about 2 weeks. 20220802 Houston Astros: SP Mark Appel was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: back spasms. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 2 days. 20220803 Cincinnati Reds: Justin De Fratus diagnosed with bone chips in his elbow, will miss 4 months. 20220803 Oakland Athletics: Zach Cone diagnosed with shoulder soreness, is day-to-day for one week. 20220803 Arizona Diamondbacks: RF Rhett Wiseman was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: knee tendinitis. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last one week. 20220803 Minnesota Twins: 1B Nick Castellanos was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: knee soreness. He's expected to miss about one week. 20220803 Philadelphia Phillies: SP Franklyn Kilome was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: shoulder tendinitis. He's expected to miss about 5 days. 20220804 Texas Rangers: J.D. Martinez diagnosed with a sprained ankle, will miss 6 weeks. 20220804 Minnesota Twins: RP Jenrry Mejia was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: mild oblique strain. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 4 days. 20220804 Miami Marlins: 2B Hector Olivera was injured in a collision at a base. The Diagnosis: fractured thumb. He's expected to miss about 4 weeks. 20220804 Washington Nationals: SP Dallas Woolfolk was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: strained forearm. He's expected to miss about 2 months. 20220804 Milwaukee Brewers: CF Manuel Margot was injured on a defensive play. The Diagnosis: strained hamstring. He's expected to miss about 3-4 weeks. 20220804 San Francisco Giants: RP Sam Coonrod was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: mild shoulder strain. He's expected to miss about 6 days. 20220804 Los Angeles Angels: SP Kyle Molnar was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: forearm soreness. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 6 days. 20220804 Chicago Cubs: RP Jesus Castro was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: shoulder soreness. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 5 days. 20220805 Cleveland Indians: SP Chris Ellis was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220805 Cleveland Indians: CF Greg Allen was injured being hit by a pitch. The Diagnosis: bruised shoulder. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last one week. 20220805 Oakland Athletics: 3B Jhoan Urena was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: mild hip strain. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 5 days. 20220805 Baltimore Orioles: CF Gene Bell was injured on a defensive play. The Diagnosis: sprained wrist. He's expected to miss about 2 weeks. 20220805 Pittsburgh Pirates: SP Clayton Kershaw was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220806 Milwaukee Brewers: RP Jalen Williams was injured . The Diagnosis: migraine. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 1 day. 20220806 Miami Marlins: RP Sam Alvis was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220806 Cleveland Indians: CF Kwang-Min Kwon was injured on a defensive play. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220806 Tampa Bay Rays: SP Jerad Eickhoff was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220806 Oakland Athletics: LF Juan Soto was injured on a defensive play. The Diagnosis: bone bruise (knee). He's expected to miss about 4 weeks. 20220806 St. Louis Cardinals: RP Justus Sheffield was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: strained triceps. He's expected to miss about 3-4 weeks. 20220807 Cleveland Indians: Chris Ellis diagnosed with a damaged elbow ligament, will miss 9 months. 20220807 San Francisco Giants: C Juan V?squez was injured . The Diagnosis: flu-like symptoms. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 1 day. 20220807 Oakland Athletics: SP Cole Baker was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220807 St. Louis Cardinals: 2B Drew Mendoza was injured while throwing the ball. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220807 San Diego Padres: SP Jarrett Montgomery was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: sore thumb. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220808 Pittsburgh Pirates: Clayton Kershaw diagnosed with an elbow strain, will miss 2-3 months. 20220808 Cleveland Indians: Kwang-Min Kwon diagnosed with an elbow sprain, will miss 2 weeks. 20220808 Miami Marlins: Sam Alvis diagnosed with a damaged elbow ligament, will miss 13 months.

news.content: 20220802 Atlanta Braves: The Atlanta Braves have announced that they set their team focus from 'Rebuild' to 'Neutral' 20220803 Chicago Cubs: Jake Fraley goes 0-3 against the Arizona Diamondbacks, ending his hitting streak at 23 games. 20220803 Washington Nationals: Anderson Espinoza sets the NL regular season game record for strikeouts with 18. 20220803 Cincinnati Reds: Anderson Espinoza strikes out 18 against the Washington Nationals. 20220803 Colorado Rockies: Michael Matuella pitches a 3-hit shutout against the Atlanta Braves with 13 strikeouts and 0 BB allowed! 20220804 Cleveland Indians: Chris Sadberry pitches a 1-hit shutout against the Detroit Tigers with 3 strikeouts and 1 BB allowed! 20220805 Oakland Athletics: Alfredo D?vila goes 5-5 against the Texas Rangers, with 2 RBI and 3 R. 20220805 Cleveland Indians: Francisco Lindor goes 5-6 against the Kansas City Royals, with 1 2B, 2 RBI and 3 R. 20220808 C Thomas Dillard of the Kansas City Royals honored: Wins the MLB AL Player of the Week Award. 20220808 C Bryce Carter of the Miami Marlins honored: Wins the MLB NL Player of the Week Award.

transactions.content: 20220801 Boston Red Sox: Placed SP Grant Sloan on the 7-day disabled list, retroactive to 07/31/2022. 20220801 Boston Red Sox: Purchased the contract of SP Dylan Steen from Triple A Pawtucket. 20220801 Boston Red Sox: LF Jake Ackerman was designated for assignment and placed on waivers. 20220801 Boston Red Sox: RF Brett Stephens was designated for assignment and placed on waivers. 20220801 Boston Red Sox: RF Keegan Meyn was designated for assignment and placed on waivers. 20220801 Boston Red Sox: SS Quinten Sefcik was designated for assignment and placed on waivers. 20220801 Cincinnati Reds: Placed RP Justin De Fratus on the 7-day disabled list, retroactive to 07/31/2022. 20220801 Cincinnati Reds: Purchased the contract of SP Riley Pint from Triple A Louisville. 20220801 Cincinnati Reds: Purchased the contract of SP Jake Vance from Triple A Louisville. 20220801 Cincinnati Reds: Demoted RF Jorge Nieto to Triple A Louisville. 20220801 Cincinnati Reds: Placed LF Kelvin Estevez on the active roster. 20220801 Cincinnati Reds: Activated LF Kelvin Estevez from the disabled list. 20220801 Cincinnati Reds: Purchased the contract of SP Triston McKenzie from Triple A Louisville. 20220801 Colorado Rockies: Placed RF H?ctor Jim?nez on the 60-day disabled list. 20220801 Colorado Rockies: Demoted CF Nicolas Pierre to Triple A Albuquerque. 20220801 Colorado Rockies: Placed C Blaise Maris on the 60-day disabled list. 20220801 Colorado Rockies: Purchased the contract of 2B Boyd Vander Kooi from Triple A Albuquerque. 20220801 Colorado Rockies: Purchased the contract of CF Pat Bell from Triple A Albuquerque. 20220801 Colorado Rockies: Purchased the contract of C Lucas Herbert from Triple A Albuquerque. 20220801 Colorado Rockies: Demoted SP Luis C. Lopez to Triple A Albuquerque. 20220801 Colorado Rockies: Purchased the contract of SP Hunter Parsons from Triple A Albuquerque. 20220801 Houston Astros: Demoted SP Jes?s Miranda to Triple A Fresno. 20220801 Houston Astros: Purchased the contract of 2B Cole Stobbe from Triple A Fresno. 20220801 Los Angeles Dodgers: Placed RF Yasiel Puig on waivers. 20220801 New York Mets: Placed SP Brenden Heiss on the 7-day disabled list, retroactive to 07/29/2022. 20220801 New York Mets: Placed SP Corey Kluber on the active roster. 20220801 New York Mets: Demoted RF Dan Pace to Double A Binghamton. 20220801 New York Mets: Purchased the contract of SP David A. Peterson from Triple A Las Vegas. 20220801 New York Mets: Demoted CF Byron Buxton to Triple A Las Vegas. 20220801 Oakland Athletics: Demoted LF Vicmal De La Cruz to Triple A Nashville. 20220801 Oakland Athletics: Placed CF David Dahl on the active roster. 20220801 Oakland Athletics: Activated CF David Dahl from the disabled list. 20220801 Tampa Bay Rays: Purchased the contract of SP ?nibal ?lvarez from Triple A Durham. 20220801 Tampa Bay Rays: Demoted SS Cadyn Grenier to Triple A Durham. 20220801 Tampa Bay Rays: Placed 2B Luke Dykstra on the active roster. 20220801 Tampa Bay Rays: Activated 2B Luke Dykstra from the disabled list. 20220801 Tampa Bay Rays: Demoted RP Resly Linares to Triple A Durham. 20220801 Tampa Bay Rays: Purchased the contract of RP Odelis Inoa from Triple A Durham. 20220801 The Oakland Athletics traded 23-year-old starting pitcher Devin Ortiz to the Colorado Rockies, getting 29-year-old reliever C.J. Robinson in return. 20220801 The Oakland Athletics traded 29-year-old starting pitcher Robert Gsellman and 21-year-old minor league first baseman Orlando Ontiveros to the Detroit Tigers, getting 19-year-old minor league first baseman Gilberto Galv?n in return. 20220801 The Chicago Cubs traded 19-year-old minor league starting pitcher Bob Ladner to the Oakland Athletics, getting 31-year-old starting pitcher Kevin Gausman, 25-year-old reliever Jonathan Olsen, 24-year-old minor league reliever Bob Isles and 22-year-old minor league reliever Will Coronado in return. 20220801 The Detroit Tigers traded 28-year-old reliever Kyle Funkhouser to the Colorado Rockies, getting 26-year-old minor league starting pitcher Esmerlin Perez in return. 20220801 The Cincinnati Reds traded 26-year-old minor league reliever Lake Dabney to the Milwaukee Brewers, getting 21-year-old minor league starting pitcher Joe Burris and 21-year-old minor league shortstop Brad Cowan in return. 20220801 The St. Louis Cardinals traded 19-year-old minor league third baseman Edgar Mata to the Chicago Cubs, getting 31-year-old starting pitcher Kevin Gausman in return. 20220801 Kansas City Royals: Demoted 3B Carter Kieboom to Triple A Omaha. 20220801 Colorado Rockies: Placed RP Frank Garces on the active roster. 20220805 Colorado Rockies: Signed SP Michael Matuella to a 6-year contract extension worth a total of $106,920,000. 20220805 Los Angeles Dodgers: Signed RP Cody Allen to a 3-year contract extension worth a total of $15,500,000. 20220808 Seattle Mariners: Claimed 1B Peter O'Brien off waivers from San Diego.
